Football (College)
lead_paragraph: A 1987 lawsuit against the N.C.A.A. underscores the difficulty of litigating claims of antitrust violations that the governor of Pennsylvania has recently made over Penn State’s sanctions.
snippet: A 1987 lawsuit against the N.C.A.A. underscores the difficulty of litigating claims of antitrust violations that the governor of Pennsylvania has recently made over Penn State’s sanctions.
